src:
How To Watch UFC 244 Prelims
02 Nov 2019 by Trent Reinsmith


LAS VEGAS, CA - MARCH 02: Johnny Walker punches a downed Misha Cirkunov. Walker defeats Cirkunov via ... [+] first round TKO during UFC 235 at the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, NV, Saturday, Mar. 2, 2019. (Photo by Hans Gutknecht/MediaNews Group/Los Angeles Daily News via Getty Images)MediaNews Group via Getty Images

The UFC is at Madison Square Garden in New York City for Saturday’s UFC 244 fight card. The pay-per-view event, which streams on ESPN+, is headlined by a welterweight contest between Jorge Masvidal and Nate Diaz. The BMF title, which was created in the mind of Diaz and spoken into existence, is on the line in that matchup. In the co-main event, Kelvin Gastelum welcomes Darren Till to the middleweight division.Every fight on the pay-per-view portion of the card has high stakes, but that doesn’t mean you should skip the prelims and wait to watch the pay-per-view portion of the card. No, the prelims have some intriguing matchups as well. 
At the top of the prelims, Corey Anderson, who has quietly put together a three-fight winning streak, faces Johnny Walker who has loudly and memorably won his first three UFC fights with “Performance of the Night” bonus-winning knockouts. This bout represents a big test for Walker, who a showy and charismatic competitor who looks and acts the part of a fun title contender. However, Walker has never faced a takedown attempt in the UFC. If there’s anything Anderson does, it’s takedowns.
Before that, two of the more exciting featherweights in the UFC face off when Shane Burgos faces Makwan Amirkhani. Burgos is 12-1 in his career, while Amirkhani is 15-3. Both fighters are on two-fight winning streaks. 
Also on the prelims is the unbeaten Edmen Shahbazyan, who is managed by Ronda Rousey. The 21-year-old has set a goal of becoming the youngest champion in UFC history. The middleweight competitor is 10-0 in his career. Shahbazyan faces UFC veteran Brad Tavares, whose past two losses have come to current UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya and former UFC titleholder Robert Whittaker. Tavares had a four-fight winning streak between those two setbacks.

HOW TO WATCH OR STREAM UFC 244

UFC 244 takes place Saturday, November 2, 2019, at Madison Square Garden in New York City. The pay-per-view card streams on ESPN+ at 10 p.m. ET. Prelims begin at 8 p.m. ET on ESPN2 following the early prelims which start at 6:30 p.m. ET on ESPN+, and UFC Fight Pass.

UFC 244 Pay-Per-View Card (ESPN+ 10 p.m. ET)

Jorge Masvidal vs. Nate Diaz   
Kelvin Gastelum vs. Darren Till   
Stephen Thompson vs. Vicente Luque  
Derrick Lewis vs. Blagoy Ivanov   
Kevin Lee vs. Gregor Gillespie   

Preliminary Card (ESPN2 8 p.m. ET)

Corey Anderson vs. Johnny Walker   
Shane Burgos vs. Makwan Amirkhani  
Brad Tavares vs. Edmen Shahbazyan   
Andrei Arlovski vs. Jairzinho Rozenstruik   

Early Preliminary Card (ESPN+ and UFC Fight Pass 6:30 p.m. ET)

Jennifer Maia vs. Katlyn Chookagian  
Lyman Good vs. Chance Rencountre   
Julio Arce vs. Hakeem Dawodu 

More From UFC 244:
text:
INTA reports San Juan
02 Nov 2019 by Cuyo Daily Writing


CYTED Forum Cuyo 2019: Innovation Strategies in Viticulture and Oenology in Mendoza and San Juan


From November 5 to 7, in the provinces of Mendoza and San Juan, the CYTED Cuyo 2019 Forum will be held: Innovation Strategies in Viticulture and Oenology. The CYTED forums are meetings between businessmen, institutional referents, technology providers and users (producers, processors) and Latin American researchers to address specific issues in a sector.
Technological advances will be known from exhibitions of companies and successful cases of viticultural startups. Experiences of innovation strategies in Latin American wine countries. There will be debates on how to boost the incorporation of knowledge in the viticulture of our countries.
Place: Mendoza headquarters at INTA EEA Mendoza, Araoz and Acceso Sur, Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza; San Juan headquarters at INTA EEA San Juan, Calle 11 and Vidart, Villa Aberastain, Pocito, San Juan.
Registration for the Mendoza headquarters, free of charge, free registration, for the San Juan headquarters, until November 1 with a limited capacity, entering http://www.innovacioncoviar.com/.
More information: Beatriz Pugliese pugliese.maria@inta.gob.ar


"Hygienic food handling in Jáchal"


On October 18, the course on "Hygienic food handling as a tool to guarantee Food Safety, self-supply and the success of family productions" was given at the facilities of the Dr. Manuel Belgrano Agricultural School of the Jachal department. by Ms. Sc. Lic. Maria Fernanda Mujica Rivas of the EEA San Juan del INTA.
The same was intended for producers of the Gal Group: Jachal pig farmers, which, as an alternative to production, generate added value with elaboration of chacinaados. The teachers of the "Industrialization" curricular space of the Schools also participated: Agrotechnical Dr. Manuel Belgrano and Agroindustrial Mons. Videla Cuello.
The topics addressed were: I- The hygienic manipulation of food aimed at guaranteeing Food Security; II- Special hygienic-sanitary considerations related to the elaboration of meat products; III- Argentine Food Code, application and scope.
As part of the practice, the analysis and evaluation of the conditions that the facilities must meet to perform food handling was performed.
More information: María Teresa Fernandez fernandez.mariat@inta.gob.ar
